name: Mauve: Prime Directive
description:
Mauve is a tile-based adventure game where you play a M.A.U.V.E, a Magnetized Autonomous Utility Vehicle Explorer. Search rubble piles to regain lost parts of your chassis.

Each new part lets you see more of the world around and in different ways. Allowing you to see farther, perceive color, tempature and more.

It is very unfinished and you cannot win or lose! drive over rubble piles to gain new parts, drive over charge stations to recharge your rover. Nothing happens when you overheat or run out of battery currently.

Controls :

W - Move Forward

S - Move back

A - Turn Left

D - Turn Right

Created by: burcarz, phopps, brt9029, thaewyn.
